tool_description: Makes final routing decisions by weighing all factors including agent match, availability, queue status, and call priority to optimize call assignment.

qualified_agents.description: Array of agent IDs qualified to handle the call

skill_match_scores.description: Skill matching scores for qualified agents

agent_availability.description: Availability status for each qualified agent

wait_times.description: Estimated wait times for each qualified agent

routing_strategy.description: Routing optimization strategy: balanced, skill_first, speed_first, or load_balancing

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All agent-related arrays must have the same length.
Invalid routing strategy: Must be one of [balanced, skill_first, speed_first, load_balancing].
No viable routing option: No acceptable routing decision could be made with current parameters.
Priority conflict: Call priority conflicts with available routing options.
usage: Provide qualified_agents, skill_match_scores, agent_availability, wait_times, and call_priority with optional customer_tier and routing_strategy to make optimal routing decision.

selected_agent.description: Agent ID selected for handling the call

routing_confidence.description: Confidence score for the routing decision (0-1)

decision_factors.description: Key factors that influenced the routing decision

expected_outcome.description: Expected outcome quality based on routing decision

backup_options.description: Alternative agents if primary selection fails
